conbody.p: TMEngine is built on top of OpenXLIFF Filters, an open source project that provides support for managing the XML side of TMX documents.
OpenXLIFF includes the last Java release of MapDB, modified to work with modules in Java 11 or newer.
MariaDB JDBC driver is also included as an optional dependency. MariaDB code does not support mudularization at this moment.
Java 11 is used to compile and link TMEngine binaries for distribution. Newer versions of Java can also be used.
